attributes.action: take action against Graham Stringer, MP comments about Dyslexia on Wednesday 14th Janurary
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: As a Dyslexic person I have worked hard over the years to learn how to work with and achieve result whilst being Dyslexic. I feel Graham Stringer words upsetting and that if it was not down to the good teaching I recived through School and University, I would not be a teacher today.
